QuestData.Title: Needs a Little Oil
QuestData.Description: You have your wood, but the encroaching elves have made it impossible for your kodo to return to Mor'shan Ramparts.$b$bI've dispatched a runner to Splintertree to summon aid. It shouldn't take long for their forces to clear the way.$b$bIn the meantime, I would ask that you do us a service. Rust has rendered our shredders inoperable. A little lubrication and they'll be as good as new.$b$bThe oil from the rotting slimes just north of here should work just fine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gorka at Warsong Labor Camp wants you to collect 5 Natural Oil from the Rotting Slimes in Ashenvale.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to collect the oil we need, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for the oil, $c. Now prepare yourself!$b$bMy runner has returned with some desperate news....$b$bSplintertree is surrounded!
